topic.title: French Movies on Play
topic.body: How to get some french movies ? Only English/American language are allowed ?

1_14gsmmDALpphFSCB6nM57HtfPsGckNpjZE.body: Je suis dans le même cas que toi, j'ai déjà poster une demande... on se tiens au courant ^^

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: i need some help about video streaming. Only Movies & Series on VO are available on PLAY ?
